keywords.fieldDescription: This refers to specific keywords that users may use to find the page. Keywords authored separated by a comma (for SEO).
keywords.name: ./keywords

siteName.fieldDescription: Site Name, e.g. Land Rover (for SEO).
siteName.name: ./siteName

schema.fieldDescription: Is a semantic vocabulary of tags (or microdata) that you can add to your HTML to improve the way search engines read and represent your page in SERPs.
schema.name: ./schema

granite:data.error-message: JSON not properly formatted. Enter a valid schema.

ogTitle.fieldDescription: Open Graph Title (If none authored, falls back to Page Title).
ogTitle.name: ./ogTitle

ogDescription.fieldDescription: Open Graph Description (If none authored, falls back to Page Description).
ogDescription.name: ./ogDescription

ogUrl.fieldDescription: A canonical URL is the URL of the page that Google thinks is most representative from a set of duplicate pages on your site.
ogUrl.name: ./ogUrl

ogType.fieldDescription: Describe the kind of object you are sharing.
ogType.name: ./ogType

ogImage.fieldDescription: The URL of the image that appears when someone shares the content to Facebook.
ogImage.name: ./ogImageUrl

twitterTitle.fieldDescription: Twitter Title (If none authored, falls back to Page Title).
twitterTitle.name: ./twitterTitle

twitterDescription.fieldDescription: Twitter Description (If none authored, falls back to Page Description).
twitterDescription.name: ./twitterDescription

noIndex.fieldDescription: Select to prevent search engine from indexing this page, and index links in them.
noIndex.name: ./noIndex

noFollow.fieldDescription: Select to prevent search engine from indexing this page, and do not index links in them.
noFollow.name: ./noFollow

namePlateCode.fieldDescription: Select the NamePlate Code that needs to appear in datalayer.
namePlateCode.name: ./namePlateCode

modelYear.fieldDescription: Select the Model year of the Nameplate that needs to be appear in datalayer.
modelYear.name: ./modelYear

applicationCode.fieldDescription: Application value that needs to appear in datalayer. Defaults to website if not entered
applicationCode.name: ./applicationCode

market.fieldDescription: Select the Market that needs to appear in the datalayer.
market.name: ./market

target.fieldDescription: Target for the link authored - current tab or same tab
target.name: ./target

nameplate.fieldDescription: Enter the nameplate ID to associate to the model year
nameplate.name: ./nameplate

modelyear.fieldDescription: Model year of the entered nameplate. Only one model year. Example : k21
modelyear.name: ./modelYear

environment.fieldDescription: Select the environment to retrieve pricing details
environment.name: ./environment

dateFormat.fieldDescription: Date Format to be used across the site.
dateFormat.name: ./dateFormat

enableInlineCookieJS.fieldDescription: Select to automatically add inline cookie consent JS to all pages.
enableInlineCookieJS.name: ./enableInlineCookieJs

gtmTags.fieldDescription: Add GTM tags specific to the website separated by commas.
gtmTags.name: ./gtmTags

desktopActive.fieldDescription: Select to enable Floating Action Button for desktop viewport across the site.
desktopActive.name: ./fabDesktopActive

tabletActive.fieldDescription: Select to enable Floating Action Button for tablet viewport across the site.
tabletActive.name: ./fabTabletActive

mobileActive.fieldDescription: Select to enable Floating Action Button for mobile viewport across the site.
mobileActive.name: ./fabMobileActive

marketpricingpath.fieldDescription: Select the Market Region Config path. This should be an experience Fragment
marketpricingpath.name: ./marketRegionPath

skipToMainTitle.fieldDescription: Enter the Skip To Main Content Title
skipToMainTitle.name: ./skipToMainTitle

errorpagespath.fieldDescription: Browse an Error page which has 404.html and 500.html
errorpagespath.name: ./errorPages
